content:
DFKI Saarbrücken is hiring!

To strengthen our dedicated team in the research department Agents and Simulated Reality in Saarbrücken we are looking for a full-time Researcher/Project Manager (m/f/d).

The research department Agents and Simulated Reality (ASR) under the direction of Prof. Dr.-Ing. Philipp Slusallek conducts research in the areas visual computing, multi-agent systems and formal methods for safe and secure systems in the context of interactive 3D simulations and visualizations as well as other applications. Using Simulated Reality, real-world scenarios can be accurately depicted and predictions about their behavior can be made.

See the full job description at: https://www.dfki.de/fileadmin/user_upload/DFKI/Medien/Ueber_uns/Karriere/Stellenangebote/20210315_FBPS-ASR_ResearcherICT48_CLAIRE_EN_aktualisiert-2_IM.pdf
